
#Normalize duration for all experiments

```{r}
#Experiment 1

#Obtain baseline means

temp1 <- aggregate(data1$Duration, 
                   list(data1$Direction, data1$Chunk, data1$Speaker), 
                   FUN = mean) 

colnames(temp1) <- c("Direction", "Chunk", "Speaker", "Duration")

#Limit results to the last 10 trials of baseline 

##Where is it?

temp2 <- data.frame(table(data1$Chunk, data1$Phase))
temp2 <- temp2[which(temp2$Freq != 0 & temp2$Var2 == "Baseline"),]
var1 <- max(as.numeric(as.character(temp2$Var1)))
var1

#Found it
temp1 <- temp1[which(temp1$Chunk == var1), ]

temp1$Tracer <- paste(temp1$Speaker, temp1$Direction, sep = "_")

data1$Tracer <- paste(data1$Speaker, data1$Direction, sep = "_")

#Pairing data from temp1 

data1$Dur_Baseline <- lookup(terms = data1$Tracer, 
                             key.match = temp1$Tracer,
                             key.reassign = temp1$Duration)

#Calculate duration change 

data1$Dur_Change <- (data1$Duration - data1$Dur_Baseline) / data1$Dur_Baseline

head(data1)
```

```{r}
#Experiment 2

#Obtain baseline means

temp1 <- aggregate(data2$Duration, 
                   list(data2$Direction, data2$Chunk, data2$Speaker), 
                   FUN = mean) 

colnames(temp1) <- c("Direction", "Chunk", "Speaker", "Duration")

#Limit results to the last 10 trials of baseline 

##Where is it?

temp2 <- data.frame(table(data2$Chunk, data2$Phase))
temp2 <- temp2[which(temp2$Freq != 0 & temp2$Var2 == "Baseline"),]
var1 <- max(as.numeric(as.character(temp2$Var1)))

#Found it
temp1 <- temp1[which(temp1$Chunk == var1), ]

temp1$Tracer <- paste(temp1$Speaker, temp1$Direction, sep = "_")

data2$Tracer <- paste(data2$Speaker, data2$Direction, sep = "_")

#Pairing data from temp1 

data2$Dur_Baseline <- lookup(terms = data2$Tracer, 
                             key.match = temp1$Tracer,
                             key.reassign = temp1$Duration)

#Calculate duration change 

data2$Dur_Change <- (data2$Duration - data2$Dur_Baseline) / data2$Dur_Baseline

head(data2)
```

```{r}
#Experiment 3

#Obtain baseline means

temp1 <- aggregate(data3$Duration, 
                   list(data3$Direction, data3$Chunk, data3$Speaker), 
                   FUN = mean) 

colnames(temp1) <- c("Direction", "Chunk", "Speaker", "Duration")

#Limit results to the last 10 trials of baseline 

##Where is it?

temp2 <- data.frame(table(data3$Chunk, data3$Phase))
temp2 <- temp2[which(temp2$Freq != 0 & temp2$Var2 == "Baseline"),]
var1 <- max(as.numeric(as.character(temp2$Var1)))

#Found it
temp1 <- temp1[which(temp1$Chunk == var1), ]

temp1$Tracer <- paste(temp1$Speaker, temp1$Direction, sep = "_")

data3$Tracer <- paste(data3$Speaker, data3$Direction, sep = "_")

#Pairing data from temp1 

data3$Dur_Baseline <- lookup(terms = data3$Tracer, 
                             key.match = temp1$Tracer,
                             key.reassign = temp1$Duration)

#Calculate duration change 

data3$Dur_Change <- (data3$Duration - data3$Dur_Baseline) / data3$Dur_Baseline

head(data3)
```

#Plot duration, Experiment 1
```{r}

TEMP0 <- data1

#Means by direction

temp1 <- aggregate(TEMP0$Dur_Change, 
                   list(TEMP0$Direction, TEMP0$Chunk), 
                   FUN = mean) 

colnames(temp1) <- c("Direction", "Chunk", "Value")

temp2 <- aggregate(TEMP0$Dur_Change, 
                   list(TEMP0$Direction, TEMP0$Chunk), 
                   FUN = plotrix::std.error) 

temp1$se <- temp2$x

temp1$Chunk <- as.numeric(as.character(temp1$Chunk)) * 10

temp1$Exp <- "Experiment 1"
```

```{r}
#Set up bars and labels

bar_1 = 35
bar_2 = 65
bar_3 = 155

var_Baseline = bar_1 / 2
var_Ramp = (bar_1 + bar_2) /2 
var_Hold = (bar_2 + bar_3) /2 
var_Washout = bar_3 + 18
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = temp1, aes(x = Chunk, y = Value, 
                         color = Direction)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = Value - se, ymax = Value + se), 
                width = 10,
                position = position_dodge(0)) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  ylab("") + 
  xlab("") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = bar_1, linetype = "twodash", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = bar_2, linetype = "twodash", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = bar_3, linetype = "twodash", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = var_Baseline, y = max(temp1$Value), 
           label = "Baseline",color = "black", size = rel(7)) +  
  annotate(geom = "text", x = var_Ramp, y = max(temp1$Value), 
           label = "Ramp", color = "black", size = rel(7)) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = var_Hold, y =  max(temp1$Value), 
           label = "Hold", color = "black", size = rel(7)) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = var_Washout, y =  max(temp1$Value), 
           label = "Washout", color = "black", size = rel(7)) +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.08, 0.33), 
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        legend.text = element_text(size = rel(1.5)),
        legend.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_text(size = rel(2)),
        axis.title =  element_text(size = rel(2.5)),
        axis.text = element_text(size = rel(2))) + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(10, 30, 40, 60, 70, 150, 160)) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("red", "blue", "gray")) + 
  facet_grid(. ~ Exp) +
  xlab("Blocks") +
  ylab("Duration change")

ggsave(filename = "H:/Shared drives/SMNG/Experiments/simonMultisyllable/Manuscript/PlotGen/7A.png",
       dpi = 300,
       width = 9/1.5,
       height = 3/1.5)
```

```{r}
#Means across direction

TEMP1 <- c()

temp1 <- aggregate(TEMP0$Dur_Change, 
                   list(TEMP0$Chunk), 
                   FUN = mean) 

colnames(temp1) <- c("Chunk", "Value")

temp2 <- aggregate(TEMP0$Dur_Change, 
                   list(TEMP0$Chunk), 
                   FUN = plotrix::std.error) 

temp1$se <- temp2$x

temp1$Chunk <- as.numeric(as.character(temp1$Chunk)) * 10

temp1$Exp <- "Experiment 1"

temp1$Type <- "Duration"

TEMP1 <- rbind(TEMP1, temp1)

TEMP1 <- TEMP1[which(TEMP1$Chunk %in% c(20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 90,
                                           100, 110, 120, 130, 160)), ]

TEMP1$Chunk <- seq(from = 10, by = 10, length.out = nrow(TEMP1))
```

#Plot duration for all experiments


```{r}
#Set up bars and labels

bar_1 = 25
bar_2 = 55
bar_3 = 125

```

```{r}
temp1 <- rbind(TEMP1, TEMP2, TEMP3)

ggplot(data = temp1, aes(x = Chunk, y = Value, color = Exp)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line(aes(linetype = Exp)) + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = Value - se, ymax = Value + se), 
                width = 7,
                position = position_dodge(0)) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  ylab("") +
  xlab("") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = bar_1, linetype = "twodash", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = bar_2, linetype = "twodash", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = bar_3, linetype = "twodash", 
             color = "black", linewidth = 0.7) + 
  theme(legend.position = c(0.083, 0.35),
        legend.title = element_blank(), 
        legend.text = element_text(size = 6), 
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = 9, vjust = 0),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 60),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), 
        axis.title.y = element_text(size = 9, vjust = 0),
        strip.text.x = element_text(size = 9)) + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-8/100, 4/100), 
                     labels = scales::percent_format(accuracy = 0.1)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#E69F03", "#00B050", "#7030A0")) + 
  facet_grid(. ~ Type) + 
  scale_linetype_manual(values=c("solid", "longdash", "dotted"))

ggsave(filename = "H:/Shared drives/SMNG/Experiments/simonMultisyllable/Manuscript/PlotGen/10A.png", 
       plot = last_plot(),
       dpi = 600,
       width = 9,
       height = 3,
       units = "in")
```
